participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Warm and nurturing, Emily loves to create and share her baked goods with others. She is friendly and enjoys engaging with people.
participant_1.background: i've a dogs. i love to bake cookies. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Sophie is a bit shy but creative. She expresses herself through gaming and often feels out of place in school.
participant_2.background: i don't have many friends. i've blue eyes and red hair that comes to my waist. i love to play pobox. i hate school. i'm a 12 year old girl.
